string-array.name: services_details
string-array.item:
Reasons to Choose SAM for Engineering Study 
 
►SAMCET is the first training partner with IBM in M.P. 
►Dedicated Research Space 
 	A new IBM research Lab was opened on campus in 2009, which can accommodate to research students. Facilities in the lab include purpose-built research workspace, seminar and social space. 
 	 ►Support for Innovation
SAM is in top heigher education institutions in M.P., in terms of the number of innovation projects completed.

resources.string:
The campaign was officially launched on 2 October 2014 at Rajghat, New Delhi, by Prime Minister Narendra Modi. It is India's largest ever cleanliness drive with 3 million government employees, and especially school and college students from all parts of India, participating in the campaign. The objectives of Swachh Bharat are to reduce or eliminate open defecation through construction of individual, cluster and community toilets. The Swachh Bharat mission will also make an initiative of establishing an accountable mechanism of monitoring latrine use
» Co-curricular activities: The institute grants incentives to achievers of co-curricular activities. They are facilitated during college functions.
Design and Developed by:-Alok Raj Singh
